folder: Winthrop St. & Flatbush Ave., Brooklyn, NY
text:
62 Winthrop Street, south side, between Flatbush and Bedford Aves. A view of the Clarkson House, razed shortly after 1925 to make way for a
6-story apartment house.
March 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

folder: Winthrop St. & Flatbush Ave., Brooklyn, NY
text:
19 Winthrop Street, north side, east of Flatbush Ave., showing the Mid-wood Hospital, destroyed by fire in June 1928, and demolished in August 1, 1928.

July 1928.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
